description: A track record of engineering roles spanning research, product development, and test across academia and industry. Demonstrated expertise in mechanical design, thermal-fluid systems, and interdisciplinary modeling.

details: Developed a highly integrated system-level model of third-generation concentrated solar power plants, enabling computationally efficient techno-economic analysis and system optimization through a physics-based approach grounded in thermodynamics and heat transfer.

Identified a path to reduce the cost of energy for concentrated solar power by 20% through simulation, optimization, and parametric analysis, leveraging advanced computational techniques in C++ and Python.

Extended and optimized a +1,000,000-line C++ codebase using Git for version control, CMake for build management, and Bash for automation, integrating new physics-based modeling capabilities and enhancing computational performance at scale.
Conceptualized, designed, and built an automated test fixture to accelerate product calibration by 800%, resulting in a theoretical fiscal gain of over $300,000 annually.
Spearheaded comprehensive thermodynamics and Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) analyses, resulting in data-driven design improvements and enhanced product reliability.
Utilized advanced 3D modeling software to meticulously engineer cutting-edge products, ensuring optimal performance and functionality across diverse operating environments.
Pioneered innovative evaluation methods for assessing thermal and mechanical benchmarks of new circuitry designs, facilitating quicker decision-making and more efficient product development cycles.
Drove product excellence by translating test performance data into actionable recommendations, which in turn lead to innovative mechanical alterations that consistently surpassed industry standards.
Coordinated the identification and formulation of precise test metrics for new and existing products, ensuring rigorous evaluation of functionality and unwavering quality.
Meticulously planned, executed, and reported on comprehensive test procedures, providing vital insight for engineering and management teams.
Directed the development of innovative manufacturing machinery by conducting in-depth customer requirement analyses to ensure designs aligned seamlessly with customer needs.

Proficiently constructed detailed Bills of Materials (BOMs) for fabrication and hardware acquisition, streamlining the production process and ensuring precise component selection for cost-effective and timely delivery.
Conducted thorough evaluations and cost analyses of system equipment and hardware, leading to strategic decisions that enhanced product quality and cost efficiency.
Successfully coached a team of seven, fostering professional development while strategically aligning their efforts to drive organizational goals and key performance metrics.
Managed multiple promotions, advertising campaigns, and strategic initiatives, contributing to over 1700 new company contacts and significantly expanding the organization's reach and impact.
Played a key role in fostering team leadership development, adaptability, and effective communication within the organization, contributing to a more cohesive and motivated team environment.
Instructed a challenging 300-level material processing lab of 200+ students over three semesters, fostering a conducive learning environment and supporting students' academic growth.

Organized and skillfully directed 15 distinct labs encompassing essential topics in material science, material processing, and design considerations, ensuring comprehensive coverage of relevant concepts.
Conducted demonstrative lab experiments on various manufacturing processes to augment theoretical learning, enabling students to gain practical knowledge and valuable hands-on experience.
